event.name: Organized Protest
event.description: Some of your people organized a protest because of the harsh conditions in the country. You lose approval.

event.name: Strike
event.description: There are reports of strikes throughout the country. You don’t gain any resources this month.

event.name: Famous person praise
event.description: A famous person in the country has praised you in the public. You gain approval.

event.name: Good season
event.description: This season was a good one for the crops. You gain bonus food.

event.name: Drought
event.description: The drought destroyed a part of your crops. You gain only part of your food income.

event.name: Denunciation
event.description: A foreign country has denounced your leadership. You lose approval.

event.name: Severe Drought
event.description: The drought destroyed all of your crops. You don’t gain any food.

event.name: Meeting with communist leader
event.description: Your meeting with the leader of a foreign communist country went well gaining praise from the people. You gain approval.

event.name: Disaster at construction site
event.description: There has been a miscommunication at a construction site, triggering a collapse. You lose building materials.

event.name: United we stand
event.description: Some of your allied countries are low on resources and you had to help them. You lose resources.

event.name: Allied Generosity
event.description: The allied countries have sent a gift to you. You gain resources.

event.name: Prosperity
event.description: Your people are glad that the country is prospering. You gain approval.

event.name: Virus
event.description: Researches in biology have gone wrong and a dangerous virus has been released. The people are panicking causing you lose approval.

event.name: Terrorist Attack
event.description: Reports of a terrorist suicide attack are circulating, inducing mass panic. You lose approval.

event.name: Mass Emigration
event.description: People observed that life in your country is hard and have started running away. You lose citizens.

event.name: Mass Immigration
event.description: There has been a wave of illegal immigrants in your country. The number of citizens has increased.

event.name: Bad rumors
event.description: A number of bad rumors have been appearing concerning your rulership. You lose approval.

event.name: Crushing the opposition
event.description: A new political party has appeared. However, your party managed to make them surrender. Your people have observed this and they are angry because you don’t give them free will. You lose approval.

event.name: Research papers stolen
event.description: Scientists from a foreign country stole a part of your research, and finished it on their own. You lose resources.

event.name: Research papers stolen
event.description: A group of scientists failed to finish their research and made no improvement thus only wasting resources. You lose resources.
